name: narwallet-extension
description: Narwallet chrome-extension wallet for NEAR protocol
author: Lucio Tato <luciotato@gmail.com>

scripts.build: tsc -b -verbose tsconfig-sourcemap.json && rm -rf test-new-install-ln && ln -sTf extension test-new-install-ln
scripts.start: git pull && npm run build && echo done. open the extension form the browser
